author: Meghna M
text: I was searching for cafes in KP and found this with 4.8 rating. No surprise, it is a decent, beautiful and affordable cafe. The staff and owner is sweet. They take feedback nicely. There is indoor and outdoor seating both. We enjoyed our ‚Ä¶

author: Kshitija
text: Visited The Voyage Cafe today to celebrate a birthday, and it was such a lovely experience! The place has a cozy vibe with a beautiful ambience‚Äîperfect for a relaxed hangout with friends or even family. ‚Ä¶

author: Shahd guitar
text: The designer must have loved his job here, the atmosphere is amaazing you feel like you are in a ship. Aside from the top noch asthetic the service is amazing litrally everyone is super nice and attentive. The food is also lovely. Would def recommend, Oh also they have cool games to play.

author: Ipsita Nandi
text: Loved the way they served us all the food and beverages. Attended their evening gigs and omg it turned out to be absolutely crazy, just loved their espresso shots and their unique blend of exquisite coffee flavours. Gonna take out my friends here again...was just worth visiting for!

author: Yashasvi Verma
text: The food and ambience both were amazing. But the best part was the staff, they were very polite and helpful. I am a vegan so they helped me get the vegan version of my favourite dishes! :) ‚Ä¶

author: Hariprakash Chandak
text: A cute small and cozy cafe to visit and spend some good quality time with their delicious food. They have both indoor and outdoor sitting. What impressed me the most about them is there staff is too polite and helpful and the food they ‚Ä¶

author: Megha N Juneja
text: Good food, great service and friendly staff. A small cafe in KP with a good ambience.

author: Shweta Jitto
text: Beautiful place, top notch service (server Jojo), nice food.. some time the chef tends to go extra on salt with the guac and salads but the meal bowls are so comforting they will make you forget everything. ‚Ä¶

author: Dipender ray
text: Great. The ambiance of the restaurant was inviting and cozy, creating a pleasant atmosphere for our lunch gathering. The variety of options on the menu made it difficult for us to choose, but we were ultimately delighted with our ‚Ä¶

author: bhakti sarda
text: This cafe has become my go-to spot whenever I‚Äôm in the area. Their coffee is consistently excellent, and the sandwiches are fresh, flavorful, and satisfying. The cozy ambiance and friendly staff make it an easy choice every time. Whether I need a quick bite or a quiet place to relax, this place never disappoints.

author: Neha Singh
text: Wonderful experience. I tried the Thai gravy after long and loved it. The berry nutty smoothie is a wholesome experience. The place is a cozy one on a busy road and Duss is so warm and welcoming. A must try. I‚Äôll visit again for sure. They have a cute dog tooüòä ‚Ä¶
